Pre-Game Insights: Cleveland is looking to build upon its seven-game win streak with a victory against Los Angeles.
The Lakers are 10-4 on their home court.
The Cavaliers are 11-3 on the road.
The Lakers average 11.8 made 3-pointers per game, 1.7 fewer than the Cavaliers allow (13.5).
The Cavaliers average 8.3 more points per game than the Lakers allow (122.4 vs 114.1).
